events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer role and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on your experience and skills.
A recruiter specialized in software developer roles has been assigned to assist you through the hiring process.
We completed the initial screening and found your qualifications suitable for moving forward to the technical round.
Thank you for your prompt response confirming your availability for the upcoming technical interview.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 20th at 10:00 AM UTC to assess your coding and problem-solving skills.
You successfully completed the technical interview demonstrating strong proficiency in software development concepts.
An HR interview has been scheduled for May 23rd to discuss your career goals, company culture fit, and next steps.
You completed the HR interview with great feedback about your interpersonal skills and alignment with the company values.
We are pleased to propose you an offer for the Software Engineer position, outlining your salary and benefits package.
Thank you for your positive feedback regarding the offer; we appreciate your enthusiasm about joining our engineering team.
You have accepted our offer; we're excited to welcome you aboard as a member of our software engineering department.
Your onboarding process has begun, including orientation sessions and setting up your development environment.
The hiring process is now complete, and your role as Software Engineer has officially commenced with us.
